tool_description: Validates documents against regulatory and organizational compliance requirements for digital signing, ensuring adherence to legal and policy standards.

document_path.description: Path to document to check for compliance

compliance_framework.description: Compliance framework to validate against: GDPR, HIPAA, SOX, PCI-DSS, or custom

error_messages: Unsupported compliance framework: Specified framework is not recognized or supported.
Compliance violation: Document does not meet one or more compliance requirements.
Missing compliance data: Required compliance information is not available in document.
Jurisdiction not supported: Compliance rules for specified jurisdiction are not available.
usage: Provide document_path and compliance_framework to validate regulatory compliance. Specify document_type and jurisdiction for targeted compliance checking. Returns detailed compliance assessment.
